messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] was HEM and Deschooling Reading now reluctant dh again!
messages.msgSnippet: Sandra, I have read them and printed out several for him, I liked Mario, good Job! Kelli SandraDodd@aol.com wrote: In a message dated 9/25/02 12:41:28 PM,
messages.messageBody:
Sandra, I have read them and printed out several for him, I liked Mario, good Job!
Kelli
SandraDodd@... wrote:
In a message dated 9/25/02 12:41:28 PM, kellitraas@... writes:

<< He is worried we are spoiling my son with the PS2. Its hard because I feel
as tho' its part of his life and learning. >>

Did you already show him the growing video game site?

I got it to have (OPTIONAL!!) music!! (I'm so happy.)

http://sandradodd.com/games/page
